    Requirements to install and use tilt packages
  • Changelog

    Requirements to install and use tilt packages

    hello-world.Rmd

    Expertise

    • Ability to install R and RStudio.
    • Ability to install R packages from CRAN, GitHub, and maybe r-universe.
    • Experience using R for Data Science.

    Hardware

    In a fresh system with 8 GB RAM and 4 AMD CPUs it took us about 1 hour to successfully complete the four tiltWorkflows for 1/4 million companies in 250 chunks. To be safe use 16 GB or more since you’re laptop likely needs memory for other background processes.

    Software

    System-level dependencies

    Our software uses continuous integration workflows (example) that ensure it works with a modern version of R in a modern version of the three main operative systems.

    Specifically, it’s tested with the latest version of R on the latest version of Windows, Mac, and Ubuntu. On Ubuntu, it’s also tested with the last two older versions of R, and with the next, in-development version of R.

    R packages

    Install the tiltWorfllows pacakge. Everything else installs automatically.

    For more details see the DESCRIPTION file of the tiltWorkflows package. Required R packages are listed under Depends, Imports, and Remotes. You may in turn see the DESCRIPTION file of each dependency to recursively find their own depencencies (to do this comprehensively you may need automatic tools).

    R setup

    • Always start R with a blank slate.
    • Work from RStudio projects.

    On this page
